sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Request a Laptop">b4345ad12f0001100e5fa55df699b689</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:db991ed52f0001100e5fa55df699b665</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Auto Populate requested for details</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
   if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
      return;
   }

	if (newValue == ''){
		g_form.setValue('name_for', '');
		g_form.setValue('email_for', '');
		g_form.setValue('mobile_for', ''); 
		g_form.setValue('location_for','');
	} else {
		var usr = g_form.getReference('requested_for', function(usr) {
			g_form.setValue('name_for', usr.first_name);
			g_form.setValue('email_for', usr.email);
			g_form.setValue('mobile_for', usr.mobile_phone); 
			g_form.setValue('location_for',usr.location);
		});
	}
   //Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below
   
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-11-25 05:29:23</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>c65be6952f4001100e5fa55df699b61a</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Auto Populate requested for details</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_c65be6952f4001100e5fa55df699b61a</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-11-25 05:29:23</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>false</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>problem</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="problem">state=101^EQ<item display_value="New" endquery="false" field="state" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value="101"/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>description contain related incident</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

	
	var prbSysID = current.sys_id;
    var gr = new GlideRecord('incident');
	var arr =[];
    gr.addQuery('problem_id', prbSysID);  
    gr.query();
    while(gr.next()) {
		arr.push(gr.number.toString());
    }
	current.description = arr.toString();

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-11-18 07:30:53</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>b09f7acb2f33b0100e5fa55df699b6ce</sys_id><sys_mod_count>46</sys_mod_count><sys_name>description contain related incident</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_b09f7acb2f33b0100e5fa55df699b6ce</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-11-23 05:46:21</sys_updated_on><template>description=^EQ</template><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=b09f7acb2f33b0100e5fa55df699b6ce"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>u_br_test</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Task 4 abhijeet</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

	// Add your code here
		var start = current.u_start;
		var end = current.u_end;
		var gdt = new GlideDateTime(start).getYearLocalTime();
		var gdt1 = new GlideDateTime(end).getYearLocalTime();
		var res = '';
		if(gdt<gdt1){
			res = 'Past';
		}
		else if(gdt>gdt1){
			res = 'Future';
		}
		else{
			res = 'Current';
		}
	current.u_result2 = res;
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-11-23 06:30:11</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>08c524fc2f4001100e5fa55df699b6fc</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Task 4 abhijeet</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_08c524fc2f4001100e5fa55df699b6fc</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-11-23 06:30:11</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=08c524fc2f4001100e5fa55df699b6fc"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_de00bfd92f0401100e5fa55df699b6f2
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.groupmanager</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>groupmanager</name><script><![CDATA[var groupmanager = Class.create();
groupmanager.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {

	grpmanager: function(){
	var sysid = this.getParameter("sysparm_group");
        var manager = '';
        var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_user_group');
        gr.addQuery('sys_id', sysid);
        gr.query();
        if (gr.next()) {
            manager = gr.manager;
        }
// 		if(manager == ''){
// 			var gr2 = new GlideRecord('sys_user_grmember');
// 			gr2.addQuery('group',sysid);
// 			gr2.query();
// 			if(gr2.next()){
// 				manager = gr2.user;
// 			}
// 		}
        return manager;
	},
    type: 'groupmanager'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-11-25 10:24:51</sys_created_on><sys_id>de00bfd92f0401100e5fa55df699b6f2</sys_id><sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count><sys_name>groupmanager</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_de00bfd92f0401100e5fa55df699b6f2</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-11-25 12:14:28</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: catalog_script_client_f28d6f592f0401100e5fa55df699b692
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>true</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>true</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Add Group Memberships">8fa6e3912f0401100e5fa55df699b6f6</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:9af9eb952f0401100e5fa55df699b670</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Get Group manager</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
   if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
      return;
   }
	
	var ga = new GlideAjax('groupmanager');
    ga.addParam('sysparm_name', 'grpmanager');
    ga.addParam('sysparm_group', newValue);
    ga.getXML(details);

    function details(response) {

        var answer = response.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute("answer");
		if(answer != ''){
			g_form.setValue('approver', answer);
			g_form.setReadOnly('approver',true);
		}
		else{
			g_form.setValue('approver', '');
			g_form.setReadOnly('approver',false);
		}
    }

// 	if (newValue == ''){
// 		g_form.setValue('approver', ''); 
// 	} else {
// 		var grp = g_form.getReference('group', function(grp) {
// 			g_form.setValue('approver', grp.manager);
// 		});
// 	}
   //Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below
   
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-11-25 10:18:29</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>f28d6f592f0401100e5fa55df699b692</sys_id><sys_mod_count>9</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Get Group manager</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_f28d6f592f0401100e5fa55df699b692</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-11-25 17:17:32</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_672b2fd52f0401100e5fa55df699b6d6
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.membership</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>membership</name><script><![CDATA[var membership = Class.create();
membership.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
	
	getOtherGroups: function(user) {
        var groups = [];
        var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_user_grmember');
        gr.addQuery('user', user);
        gr.query();
        while (gr.next()) {
            groups.push(gr.group.sys_id);
        }
        return 'sys_idNOT IN' + groups.toString();
    },

    type: 'membership'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-11-25 10:07:30</sys_created_on><sys_id>672b2fd52f0401100e5fa55df699b6d6</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>membership</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_672b2fd52f0401100e5fa55df699b6d6</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-11-25 10:07:30</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>false</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>incident</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Task 1 saurav</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

	// Add your code here
	var user = current.caller_id;
	var gr = new GlideRecord('incident');
	gr.addQuery('caller_id',user);
	gr.query();
	var rows = gr.getRowCount();
	if(rows > 2){
		current.setAbortAction(true);
		gs.addErrorMessage("not more than 2 records for same caller allowed!!!!")
	}
	else{
		current.setAbortAction(false);
	}

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-11-23 06:50:07</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>71ba6cb02f8001100e5fa55df699b618</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Task 1 saurav</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_71ba6cb02f8001100e5fa55df699b618</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-11-23 08:23:14</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=71ba6cb02f8001100e5fa55df699b618"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>false</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>problem</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="problem">state=103^EQ<item display_value="Root Cause Analysis" endquery="false" field="state" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value="103"/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Task 1 abhijeet</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

	// Add your code here
	var prbSysID = current.sys_id;
    var gr = new GlideRecord('incident');
	var arr =[];
    gr.addQuery('problem_id', prbSysID);  
    gr.query();
    while(gr.next()) {
		arr.push(gr.number.toString());
    }
	current.description = arr.toString();

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-11-23 05:43:10</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>c1eb5c302f4001100e5fa55df699b665</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Task 1 abhijeet</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_c1eb5c302f4001100e5fa55df699b665</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-11-23 08:52:21</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=c1eb5c302f4001100e5fa55df699b665"/></record_update>

restrictedtrueon_desktopfalsed258b953c611227a0146101fb1be7c3101970-01-03 00:00:00We designed a totally new architecture and turned the lenses 45 degrees to fit in our best dual-camera system ever — with its biggest Wide camera sensor. We also made room for our sensor-shift optical image stabilization. And we equipped the Ultra Wide camera with a faster sensor.

Filmmakers use a technique called rack focus — shifting focus from one subject to another — to guide the audience’s attention in their movies. Now iPhone makes it easy for you to bring the same storytelling technique to your videos.

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_e35948ed2f4401100e5fa55df699b6dc
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.approvers</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>approvers</name><script><![CDATA[var approvers = Class.create();
approvers.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {

    getMembers :function(grp){
		var members = [];
        var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_user_grmember');
        gr.addQuery('group', grp);
        gr.query();
        while (gr.next()) {
            members.push(gr.user.sys_id);
        }
        return 'sys_idIN' + members.toString();
	}
	
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-11-25 12:17:43</sys_created_on><sys_id>e35948ed2f4401100e5fa55df699b6dc</sys_id><sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count><sys_name>approvers</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_e35948ed2f4401100e5fa55df699b6dc</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-11-26 03:58:00</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
